author: benh
msg: Added a retry limit on cgroups freezing attempts.

author: benh
msg: Added _advisory_ file locking so that we don't attempt to remove valid
cgroups if a second slave is started on a host (e.g., by accident).

author: benh
msg: Updated the cgroups isolation module to use
'memory.soft_limit_in_bytes' when decreasing the memory limit. Also
made some small simplifications to cleanup the code base (some of
which are from https://reviews.apache.org/r/6534, which is discarded
